title: 110_s2798
content: Global Autism Assistance Act of 2008 - Directs the Administrator for the United States Agency for International Development (USAID) to establish and administer a health and education grant program to: (1) support activities by nongovernmental organizations and other service providers, including advocacy groups, focused on autism in developing countries. And (2) establish a teach the teachers program to train health and education professionals working with autistic children in developing countries.
